text: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.
author: Euripides

text: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain.
author: Victor Hugo

text: Do you know the difference between a beautiful woman and a charming one? A beauty is a woman you notice, a charmer is one who notices you.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

text: Art is not the application of a canon of beauty but what the instinct and the brain can conceive beyond any canon. When we love a woman we don't start measuring her limbs.
author: Pablo Picasso

text: I'm just glad I was able to return to some of that innocence and beauty I had as a child when I started my own family, and my children brought me back some of that spirit.
author: Angelina Jolie
